text: For tis not in mere death that men die most.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

text: Men do not fail they give up trying.
author: Elihu Root

text: Men are like sheep, of which a flock is more easily driven than a single one.
author: Richard Whately

text: I have always supported measures and principles and not men.
author: Davy Crockett

text: Time takes away the grief of men.
author: Desiderius Erasmus
